text: Lennox is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Lincoln County. It became a city in 1889, and 2,423 people lived there at the 2020 census. And it has the best marching bands in the state. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Lennox website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1889 establishments in South Dakota
title: Lennox, South Dakota
